title: MLB Lockout, Mickelson Apology Over Super League
itunes:title: MLB Lockout, Mickelson Apology Over Super League
description:
Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the latest on the MLB lockout and the controversy over Phil Mickelson's comments about the organizers of the Saudi-financed breakaway Super League.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
